name: one thing.
body:
### Welcome to One Thing.
This is where I share `one thing` I like on the web right now. It will stay here until I decide it is worth replacing with something else. There is no archive. If you share my tastes/interests **this thing will probably appeal to you right now.** If not, no biggie... it's just one thing. Please enjoy! 

## Charles Eames answers every question you ever had about design but didn't think to ask (and does it very succinctly). 

<iframe width="420" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/z8qs5-BDXNU" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

# Working Notes
This site is an exercise in creative [satisficing.](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Satisficing) The design will change without notice, just like the content.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
